> ELECTED OFFICIALS

### Municipal Council President & 3rd Ward Council Member Gary La Pelusa Sr.

**Third Ward Boundaries:**
The Third Ward includes the area from the north side of 32nd Street to the City Line.

**What have been your accomplishments as a City Council Member?**

Some of my accomplishments have been helping save Bayonne Hospital; promoting smart development at MOTBY and citywide; revitalizing our city parks; and making decisions to balance the budget and lower the structural deficit.

**What things would you still like to accomplish as a Council Member?**

I would like to drastically decrease the structural deficit; promote smart development; help those in need; and add more law enforcement to help against crime and violence.

**What do you like about being a Council Member?**

I enjoy helping my constituents resolve issues and making decisions that affect our city in a positive way.

My favorite movies are The Godfather and The Shawshank Redemption.
My favorite sports teams are the New York Yankees and the Pittsburgh Steelers.
The Bible.
Blue is my favorite color.
My favorite childhood memories are visiting the Baseball Hall of Fame at Cooperstown; going to Florida with my Mom, Dad, and Brother; and playing Little League baseball.

I am a workaholic and I am self-employed. I have owned Gary La Pelusa Landscaping, LLC for almost 30 years.

**Current Term: July 1, 2022 to June 30, 2026**
